qas.question: How many Emmy awards did Ray of Light won?
Who listed Ray of Light as "The 500 Greatest Albums of All Time?"
How many albums did Ray of Light sell worldwide?
Which single in the album made it to the UK number one?
The single Ray of Light debut at which number of the Billboard Hot 100?

context: The album garnered critical acclaim. Ray of Light was honored with <a0_0>four<a0_0/> Grammy Awards. In 2003, Slant Magazine called it "one of the great pop masterpieces of the '90s" and <a1_0>Rolling Stone<a1_0/> listed it among "The 500 Greatest Albums of All Time". Commercially, the album peaked at number one in numerous countries and sold more than <a2_0>16 million copies<a2_0/> worldwide. The album's first single, "<a3_0>Frozen<a3_0/>", became Madonna's first single to debut at number one in the UK, while in the U.S. it became her sixth number-two single, setting another record for Madonna as the artist with the most number two hits. The second single, "Ray of Light", debuted at number <a4_0>five<a4_0/> on the Billboard Hot 100.
